item.title: Enhancing Logic Apps security with obfuscation
item.description: Introduction of obfuscation feature in Azure Logic Apps for input and output blocks allows for better secret management and enhanced security. This article will focus on presenting capabilities of this feature.

item.title: Securing Logic App with Azure AD authentication using API Management
item.description: Logic Apps are great but exposing them as publicly available HTTP service is clearly far from perfect. This article shows how to solve this challenge by using API Management service which be used to secure Logic Apps HTTP endpoint with Azure AD token authentication.

item.title: Securing Azure Services with Managed Identities
item.description: Managing application account credentials is just another thing to worry for application developers; especially in public cloud. Learn what is Managed Identity for Azure Services and how does it solve this problem.
